name: The Moon Cycle
description:
In the Moon Cycle, you are going to embody Cassiopée, a young woman who suffers of a cyclothymic disorder, the 3rd form of bipolarity. The game takes place in her head and she discovers new abilities, she can transform into red panda and raccoon when her mood changes. During her journey she will learn how to use her capacities and how to accept them. 

The game was made as part of a project at EPTA Rennes to move to the second year.
